message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_PDPI_RNFE
message.locale: Case start date must not be earlier than product delivery pattern start date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_FOR_EFT
message.locale: Bank Account details must be supplied where delivery method is EFT.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_NO_ADDRESS_FOR_CHQ
message.locale: Address details must be supplied where delivery method is Cheque.
Address details must be supplied where delivery method is CHECK.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XRV_FROM_DATE_PAID_DATE
message.locale: From date supplied is invalid as it has already been paid in respect of this case. From date must not fall before "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_CURRENCYTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Currency Type must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_RELATIONSHIPTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Relationship Type must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_FROM_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: From Date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_CONCERNCASEROLEID_EMPTY
message.locale: A Participant must be selected.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_FROM_DATE_DELIVERY_PATTERN
message.locale: From Date must be supplied when product delivery pattern is changed.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_NOMINEE_IS_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: The relationship cannot be changed as this nominee is the primary client.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_NOMINEE_IS_NOT_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: A relationship of this type cannot be selected as this nominee is not the primary client.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XRV_NOMINEE_EXISTS_FOR_CONCERNROLE
message.locale: This Participant already exists as a Case Nominee for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_FV_COMPONENT_ALREADY_ASSIGNED_TO_NOMINEE
message.locale: The component is currently assigned to this nominee.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_ALREADY_DEFAULT
message.locale: This nominee is already the default nominee for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_DECEASED
message.locale: %1s is deceased with a date of death of %2d and can not become a nominee to receive payments for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_EXPIRED_RECEIVE_COMPONENTS
message.locale: The nominee must not be assigned any components.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_EXPIRED_DEFAULT_NOMINEE
message.locale: This nominee cannot be deactivated as they are set as the default nominee for the case.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_EXPIRED_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: This nominee cannot be deactivated as they are set as the primary client for the case.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_EXPIRED_ALREADY
message.locale: This nominee cannot be deactivated as they are deactivated already.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_REACTIVATE_NON_EXPIRED
message.locale: This nominee is not deactivated.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_ASSIGN_COMPONENT_TO_EXPIRED
message.locale: This component cannot be assigned to this nominee as the nominee status is deactivated.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_SET_AS_DEFAULT_WHEN_EXPIRED
message.locale: This nominee cannot be set as the default nominee as the nominee status is deactivated.

message.name: INF_SERVICESUPPLIER_NOT_PAID
message.locale: No Service Supplier paid yet.

message.name: ERR_ASSIGN_COMPONENT_ALREADY_PAID
message.locale: You cannot assign a component to a nominee for a date that is before the last date paid in respect of the case.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CERTIFY_CASE
message.locale: You cannot certify this case before the creation date of the Delivery Pattern used.

message.name: ERR_ASSIGN_COMPONENT_FV_FROMDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ASSIGN_COMPONENT_FV_FROMDATE_BEFORE_CASE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start Date must have a date equal to or greater than the Case Start Date.

message.name: ERR_CASE_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: A Nominee cannot be added to a case with a status of Closed.

message.name: INF_NOMINEE_HAS_ACTIVE_DEDUCTION
message.locale: The following deduction(s) exist for the original nominee %1s. The deduction(s) will only be processed if the nominee on each deduction is modified: %2s.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as a new case nominee.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_EMPTY_SELECT
message.locale: A Nominee must be selected or newly registered.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_MULTIPLE_SELECT
message.locale: Only one Nominee can be selected or newly registered.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_STARTDATE_AND_IND_EMPTY
message.locale: Start Date must be entered or From Case Start Date indicator selected.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_XFV_STARTDATE_AND_IND
message.locale: Start Date can be entered or From Case Start Date indicator selected, but not both.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_NO_NOMINEE_EXISTS_ON_FROM_DATE
message.locale: A component on case %1s effective on %2d has a rate target of '%3s', but no case nominee of type '%4s' has been set up to receive this component on this date.
